name: BlockBoi
description:
Block boi is a game for two people where each has to try to kill each other, using the surrounding obstacles to their advantage.

Controls
  • Blue Boi:
    • WASD to move
    • Left Control/Ctrl to shoot
  • Red Boi:
    • Arrow Keys to Move
    • Right Control/Ctrl to shoot
Gameplay

Each player has to try to kill each other without getting killed themselves.

The obstacles block players from passing through them, but this doesn't prevent bullets from doing so. There's a catch though. The bullets can only pass through obstacles of their colour. Meaning if the blue player shoots a bullet through a red obstacle, the bullet will not pass through

By Potatoes08Dev

Made with PyGame
